key_points: Import the necessary statistical libraries and pytest for testing
Write tests for individual functions implementing statistical methods
Use fixture to manage shared resources such as test data or test environment settings
Leverage parameterized tests for testing multiple inputs in a single test function
Mock external libraries when writing unit tests for complex or integrated statistical functions
Implement tests for edge cases, missing inputs, and unexpected outputs to ensure robustness
Utilize pytest plugins like Hypothesis for generating more diverse input data for testing
